TopicTitle: Collided with launch pad while in orbit.

Articles.Content: Just encountered a bug I haven't seen before. Was aerobraking back from Minmus and half my ship disintegrated. Looked at the flight report and it said I collided with the launch pad while at 40km.

Hm, may be related to this bug: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96823-Random-destruction-of-wings

What parts went first? Triangular wings, per chance?
If you restart KSP it stops this from reoccurring, a reload isn't enough.

Hm, may be related to this bug: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96823-Random-destruction-of-wings

What parts went first? Triangular wings, per chance?

Yep a triangular wing broke first. Caused structural failures and the ship disintegrated.

I had this bug very often since my trainings shuttle as well as a recovery ship use the small triangular wing as structural part. And like every 2nd time they had this bug when aerobreaking. I think it might actually be a structural failure of the wing but who knows.
